price: Asεm a wͻka kyerεε (Mose) ne sε: “Nkonyaayini, frε wo Wura Nyankopͻn ma yεn sεdeε Ɔne wo bͻhyε kyerε no. Nokorε sε yεbεfa tenenee (kwan no) so.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuha al-sāḥiru ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka bimā ʿahida ʿindaka innanā lamuh'tadūna
